snippet: A second person was indicted on charges that kickbacks were paid to a former state corrections commissioner in exchange for contracts.
abstract: Sam Waggoner pleads guilty to one count of bribery in corruption case surrounding former Mississippi Corrections Commissioner Christopher Epps; former state Sen Irb Benjamin pleads not guilty to three counts of conspiracy and bribery and is released on bail.
lead_paragraph: A second person was indicted on charges that kickbacks were paid to a former state corrections commissioner in exchange for contracts.

headline.main: Mississippi: Another Guilty Plea in Widening Prison Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Another Guilty Plea in Widening Prison Bribery Case
